title: The Effing Minions Episode and Top 5 Movies We’ll Show Our Kids
description:
After years of threats, Sean and Amanda finally dive deep into the franchise that houses the world’s biggest movie stars: the Minions! They discuss the movies, including the just released ‘The Rise of Gru’ (2:00) and then share five movies they will show their children (39:00).
Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Producer: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
